content: Add ExtrasDiscovery struct to engine/types.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after adding ExtrasDiscovery type
Create engine/extras_discovery.rs file with module structure
Add extras_discovery module to engine/mod.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after module setup
Implement build_extras_corrections() method in extras_discovery.rs
Extract extras discovery logic from execute_level_2_direct_discovery in old_engine
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after implementing extras discovery
Add continue_after_extras_discovery method to old_engine.rs
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after adding continuation method
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Update orchestrator.rs to handle ExtrasDiscovery state
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after orchestrator update
Add integration tests for all three orchestrator paths
Run cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt after adding tests
Run cargo nextest run
STOP if test failures - review with user
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review (read-only)
Review suggestions with user
